resp = client.indices.create(
    index="my-index-000001",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "attributes": {
                "type": "passthrough",
                "priority": 10,
                "properties": {
                    "id": {
                        "type": "keyword"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="my-index-000001",
    id="1",
    document={
        "attributes": {
            "id": "foo",
            "zone": 10
        }
    },
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.search(
    index="my-index-000001",
    query={
        "bool": {
            "must": [
                {
                    "match": {
                        "id": "foo"
                    }
                },
                {
                    "match": {
                        "zone": 10
                    }
                }
            ]
        }
    },
)
print(resp2)

    index="my-index-000001",
    query={
        "bool": {
            "must": [
                {
                    "match": {
                        "attributes.id": "foo"
                    }
                },
                {
                    "match": {
                        "attributes.zone": 10
                    }
                }
            ]
        }
    },

print(resp3)
